items.sentence: Tom was lying in bed, staring up at the ceiling.
Tom was reaching for his gun when Mary shot him.
Tom was stupid enough to believe what Mary said.
I\'m just trying to figure out what\'s going on.
Tom and Mary didn\'t invite me to their wedding.
Tom and Mary didn\'t say anything to each other.
Tom and Mary don\'t do that together very often.
Tom wrote his name on the cover of his notebook.
When was the last time you and I saw each other?
When was the last time you brought Mary flowers?
